speaker: WARWICK
text:
Trust
               
              me
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              all
               
              hitherto
               
              goes
               
              well
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
The
               
              common
               
              people
               
              by
               
              numbers
               
              swarm
               
              to
               
              us
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
But
               
              see
               
              where
               
              Somerset
               
              and
               
              Clarence
               
              comes
              .
              —

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Speak
               
              suddenly
              ,
               
              my
               
              lords
              :
               
              are
               
              we
               
              all
               
              friends
              ?

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
Fear
               
              not
               
              that
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Then
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              Clarence
              ,
               
              welcome
               
              unto
               
              Warwick
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              welcome
              ,
               
              Somerset
              .
               
              I
               
              hold
               
              it
               
              cowardice

speaker: WARWICK
text:
To
               
              rest
               
              mistrustful
               
              where
               
              a
               
              noble
               
              heart

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Hath
               
              pawned
               
              an
               
              open
               
              hand
               
              in
               
              sign
               
              of
               
              love
              ;

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Else
               
              might
               
              I
               
              think
               
              that
               
              Clarence
              ,
               
              Edward’s
               
              brother
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Were
               
              but
               
              a
               
              feignèd
               
              friend
               
              to
               
              our
               
              proceedings
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
But
               
              welcome
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              Clarence
              ;
               
              my
               
              daughter
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              thine
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              now
              ,
               
              what
               
              rests
               
              but
              ,
               
              in
               
              night’s
               
              coverture

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Thy
               
              brother
               
              being
               
              carelessly
               
              encamped
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
His
               
              soldiers
               
              lurking
               
              in
               
              the
               
              town
               
              about
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              but
               
              attended
               
              by
               
              a
               
              simple
               
              guard
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
We
               
              may
               
              surprise
               
              and
               
              take
               
              him
               
              at
               
              our
               
              pleasure
              ?

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Our
               
              scouts
               
              have
               
              found
               
              the
               
              adventure
               
              very
               
              easy
              ;

speaker: WARWICK
text:
That
              ,
               
              as

              and
               
              stout

speaker: WARWICK
text:
With
               
              sleight

              tents

text:
And

              the

              fatal
               
              steeds
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
So
               
              we
              ,
               
              well
               
              covered
               
              with
               
              the

              black
               
              mantle
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
At
               
              unawares
               
              may

And

              ,
              ”

For

speaker: WARWICK
text:
You
               
              that

Applaud

Why

              .

For
